name: Modified Pure Data Patch File
summary: A PD2 file is a modified Pure Data (Pd) patch file that improves accessibility for visually impaired users working with the Pure Data visual programming environment. It is similar to a standard .PD patch file, defining audio or multimedia programs using a visual programming structure, but it includes enhancements such as custom variable names, comments, accessible object labels, and additional metadata to aid screen reader support and usability.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: PD2 file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code 1.99
